## 1D Convolution

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r}
sample_size = 200
signal_size = 10
range = 5
```

```{r}
case = '1D'
epochs = 800
ks = c(2,3,4,5)
qs = c(2,3,4,5,6,7)

n_simulations = 100
```


```{r}
for (kernel_size in ks){
  mse = array(dim=c(n_simulations,signal_size-kernel_size+1))
  for (q_taylor in qs){
    if (q_taylor %% 2 == 1){
      activation = 'tanh'
    }
    else{
      activation = 'softplus'
    }
    for (i in 1:n_simulations){
      out = simulate(sample_size, signal_size, range, 
                     case, kernel_size, epochs,
                     activation, q_taylor)
      mse[i,] = out$MSE.NN.vs.PR.feature
    }
    saveRDS(mse, paste0(case, "_k=", kernel_size,"_q=",q_taylor,"_",activation))
  }
}

```

## 2D Convolution

### k=1

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r}
sample_size = 200
signal_size = 10
range = 5
```

```{r}
case = '2D'

qs = c(2,3,4,5,6,7)
```

```{r}
n_simulations = 100
mse = array(dim=c(n_simulations,signal_size-kernel_size+1,signal_size-kernel_size+1))
for (q_taylor in qs){
  if (q_taylor %% 2 == 1){
    activation = 'tanh'
  }
  else{
    activation = 'softplus'
    }
  for (i in 1:n_simulations){
    out = simulate(sample_size, signal_size, range, 
                   case, kernel_size, epochs,
                   activation, q_taylor)
    mse[i,,] = out$MSE.NN.vs.PR.feature
  }
  saveRDS(mse, paste0(case, "_k=", kernel_size,"_q=",q_taylor,"_", activation))
}
```


### k=2

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r}
sample_size = 200
signal_size = 10
range = 5
```

```{r}
case = '2D'
kernel_size = 2
q_taylor = 2
epochs = 10
activations = c('softplus', 'tanh')
```


```{r}
n_simulations = 100
mse = array(dim=c(n_simulations,signal_size-kernel_size+1,signal_size-kernel_size+1))
for (fun in activations){
  for (i in 1:n_simulations){
    out = simulate(sample_size, signal_size, range, 
                   case, kernel_size, epochs,
                   fun, q_taylor)
    mse[i,,] = out$MSE.NN.vs.PR.feature
  }
  saveRDS(mse, paste0(case, "_k=", kernel_size,"_q=",q_taylor,"_", fun))
}
```
